Title: Love on the Run
Writer: François Truffaut (scenario), Marie-France Pisier (scenario), Jean Aurel (scenario), Suzanne Schiffman (scenario)
Actors: Jean-Pierre Léaud, Marie-France Pisier, Claude Jade, Dani
Plot: Antoine Doinel is now more than thirty. He divorces from Christine. He is a proofreader, and is in love with Sabine, a record seller. Colette, his teenager love, is now a lawyer. She buys Antoine's first published autobiographical novel. They meet again in a station...
